article_title: Sanders Has A Much More Practical Plan Than Clinton To Raise Taxes On Rich

article_metadata.description: Sanders’s proposed tax hikes may be politically untenable and economically risky. But he’s got the design right: a direct, simple, increase of rates, as opposed to the indirect, back-door approach proposed by Hillary Clinton, which would further complicate our already vexing tax system.
article_metadata.author: Business in the Beltway
